String1: App to manage a database that I use in other apps
String2: This application only has a single purpose, to manage a database that uses other applications that I have developed. It was more comfortable for me to update the database externally with this app than to update 3 apps manually.
String4: I created a basic interface to see that the different database tables are loaded properly and can be read by other apps.
String6: In order to be able to work from any app or website, the app generates .json files for the various databases.
